newsitem.title: UK: Sema's Bonelli sells shares at 1200p.
newsitem.headline: Sema's Bonelli sells shares at 1200p.

text.p: British computer services group Sema Group Plc said on Tuesday its chief executive, Pierre Bonelli, had sold about 26,617 shares at 1200p.
The company said Bonelli exercised an option over the shares at a price of about 218p on Monday.
Following the transaction, Bonelli continued to own some 104,294 shares, representing 0.09 percent of Sema's issued share capital.
Sema's shares dropped 37.5p to close at 1190 on Tuesday, dragged lower by recent sharp falls in U.S. rival Electronic Data Systems Corp, dealers said. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717
